title: #8 - What Is Scump's Future After OpTic Gaming?
itunes:title: #8 - What Is Scump's Future After OpTic Gaming?
description: On this episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show presented by Cash App, CouRage and Nadeshot welcome on multi-COD champion, Scump. They discuss the rise and fall of Optic Gaming, COD franchising, underrated and overrated movies, and more.
content:encoded: On this episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show presented by Cash App, CouRage and Nadeshot welcome on multi-COD champion, Scump. They discuss the rise and fall of Optic Gaming, COD franchising, underrated and overrated movies, and more.
